name: Immortal Gladiator
description:
Immortal Gladiator is very early game. You are an immortal and you fight mortal dudes with your mighty sword. 

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, LMB to simple attack LMB+Q left attack, LMB+E right attack. F to pick up everything. Z to throw sword, X to throw shield. You can use shield on RMB (not working) Have a good game!

Also some legends say that there is a boss on 20 wave...
